links.to_node: stop to help and be late for work

node.label: stop to help and be late for work

links.to_node: I am late for my first day of work, which may create a negative impression on my boss and colleagues.
The person who crashed their bike may be injured and in need of assistance.
I may miss out on important instructions or training at the beginning of my shift.
My willingness to help someone in need may be appreciated by the person I assist and others who witness the situation.
I may feel a sense of guilt or anxiety about being late for work and the potential consequences of my tardiness.
My decision to stop and help may demonstrate my values and character to my boss and colleagues, potentially earning their respect in the long run.
